question: 2) Biology – Multiple Choice MRSA [mirsa] is an infection-causing bacteria. Which of the following best describes why MRSA is especially difficult to treat relative to many other human pathogens? W) It reproduces very quickly X) It can evade the immune system Y) It is resistant to many antibiotics Z) It secretes harmful toxins
answer: Y) IT IS RESISTANT TO MANY ANTIBIOTICS

X) ITS ORBIT HAD LOW ECCENTRICITY
